metadata.title: CVE-2022-35278 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Apache ActiveMQ Artemis prior to 2.24.0, an attacker could showmalicious content and/or redirect users to a malicious URL in the webconsole by using HTML in the name of an address or queue.

criterions.comment: activemq: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
artemis: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
